SELECT COUNT(*) FROM schedule WHERE id=#{id} or SUBSTR(mdate,1,8)=#{yyyyMMdd}

SELECT ID, COALESCE( CAST( SUM(CAST(SUBSTRING(work_hours, 1, POSITION(':' IN COALESCE(work_hours, '0:0')) - 1) AS INT)) + SUM(CAST(SUBSTRING(work_hours, POSITION(':' IN COALESCE(work_hours, '0:0')) + 1) AS INT)) / 60 AS SIGNED ), 0 ) AS total_hours, COALESCE( SUM(CAST(SUBSTRING(work_hours, POSITION(':' IN COALESCE(work_hours, '0:0')) + 1) AS INT)) % 60, 0 ) AS total_minutes FROM schedule WHERE SUBSTRING(mdate, 1, 4) = SUBSTRING(#{yyyyMM}, 1, 4) AND SUBSTRING(mdate, 5, 2) = SUBSTRING(#{yyyyMM}, 5, 2) AND ID = #{id}

SELECT s.id, COALESCE( CAST( (SUM(CAST(SUBSTRING(s.work_hours, 1, POSITION(':' IN COALESCE(s.work_hours, '0:0')) - 1) AS INT)) + SUM(CAST(SUBSTRING(s.work_hours, POSITION(':' IN COALESCE(s.work_hours, '0:0')) + 1) AS INT)) / 60) AS SIGNED ), 0 ) AS total_hours , COALESCE( SUM(CAST(SUBSTRING(s.work_hours, POSITION(':' IN COALESCE(s.work_hours, '0:0')) + 1) AS INT)) % 60, 0 ) AS total_minutes, COALESCE( (SUM(CAST(SUBSTRING(s.work_hours, 1, POSITION(':' IN COALESCE(s.work_hours, '0:0')) - 1) AS INT)) + SUM(CAST(SUBSTRING(s.work_hours, POSITION(':' IN COALESCE(s.work_hours, '0:0')) + 1) AS INT)) / 60)) * m.pay AS month_pay FROM schedule s JOIN member m ON s.id = m.id WHERE SUBSTRING(mdate, 1, 4) = SUBSTRING(#{yyyyMM}, 1, 4) AND SUBSTRING(mdate, 5, 2) = SUBSTRING(#{yyyyMM}, 5, 2) AND s.id = #{id}

SELECT s.id, COALESCE( CAST( (SUM(CAST(SUBSTRING(s.work_hours, 1, POSITION(':' IN COALESCE(s.work_hours, '0:0')) - 1) AS INT)) + SUM(CAST(SUBSTRING(s.work_hours, POSITION(':' IN COALESCE(s.work_hours, '0:0')) + 1) AS INT)) / 60) AS SIGNED ), 0 ) AS total_hours, COALESCE( SUM(CAST(SUBSTRING(s.work_hours, POSITION(':' IN COALESCE(s.work_hours, '0:0')) + 1) AS INT)) % 60, 0 ) AS total_minutes, COALESCE( CAST( (SUM(CAST(SUBSTRING(s.work_hours, 1, POSITION(':' IN COALESCE(s.work_hours, '0:0')) - 1) AS INT)) + SUM(CAST(SUBSTRING(s.work_hours, POSITION(':' IN COALESCE(s.work_hours, '0:0')) + 1) AS INT)) / 60) * m.pay AS SIGNED ), 0 ) AS month_pay FROM schedule s JOIN member m ON s.id = m.id WHERE SUBSTRING(s.mdate, 1, 4) = SUBSTRING(#{yyyyMM}, 1, 4) AND SUBSTRING(s.mdate, 5, 2) = SUBSTRING(#{yyyyMM}, 5, 2) AND s.id =#{id}

SELECT s.id, s.mdate, s.sdate,s.edate,s.work_hours, COALESCE( CAST( (SUM(CAST(SUBSTRING(s.work_hours, 1, POSITION(':' IN COALESCE(s.work_hours, '0:0')) - 1) AS INT)) + SUM(CAST(SUBSTRING(s.work_hours, POSITION(':' IN COALESCE(s.work_hours, '0:0')) + 1) AS INT)) / 60) AS SIGNED ), 0 ) AS total_hours, COALESCE( SUM(CAST(SUBSTRING(s.work_hours, POSITION(':' IN COALESCE(s.work_hours, '0:0')) + 1) AS INT)) % 60, 0 ) AS total_minutes, COALESCE( CAST( (SUM(CAST(SUBSTRING(s.work_hours, 1, POSITION(':' IN COALESCE(s.work_hours, '0:0')) - 1) AS INT)) + SUM(CAST(SUBSTRING(s.work_hours, POSITION(':' IN COALESCE(s.work_hours, '0:0')) + 1) AS INT)) / 60) * m.pay AS SIGNED ), 0 ) AS month_pay FROM schedule s JOIN member m ON s.id = m.id WHERE SUBSTRING(s.mdate, 1, 4) = SUBSTRING(#{yyyyMM}, 1, 4) AND SUBSTRING(s.mdate, 5, 2) = SUBSTRING(#{yyyyMM}, 5, 2) AND s.id =#{id} GROUP BY s.id, s.mdate, s.name, s.sdate, s.edate, s.work_hours
